# forloops
> AI governance and compliance engineering by Sagar Gogineni.
> Building open-source tooling for EU AI Act compliance.

## About
- [About Sagar Gogineni](https://for-loops.com/#about): AI Engineer based in Berlin. 5+ years across banking, pharma, and automotive. MSc in Computer Science from SRH Berlin. Specializes in building compliance-as-code tooling for the EU AI Act.

## Projects
- [AgentGuard](https://github.com/Sagar-Gogineni/agentguard): Open-source Python SDK for EU AI Act compliance â€” risk classification, bias detection, transparency enforcement, and audit trail generation.
